mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.name AS "name", a.barcode AS "barcode", a.image AS "image", a.sku_id AS "skuId", a.sku1 AS "sku1", a.sku2 AS "sku2", a.sku3 AS "sku3", a.sku_barcode AS "skuBarcode", a.retail_price AS "retailPrice", a.deal_price AS "dealPrice", a.counts AS "counts"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM order_commodity a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_commodity( id, order_id, name, barcode, image, sku_id, sku1, sku2, sku3, sku_barcode, retail_price, deal_price, counts ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{name}, #{barcode}, #{image}, #{skuId}, #{sku1}, #{sku2}, #{sku3}, #{skuBarcode}, #{retailPrice}, #{dealPrice}, #{counts} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_commodity SET order_id = #{orderId}, name = #{name}, barcode = #{barcode}, image = #{image}, sku_id = #{skuId}, sku1 = #{sku1}, sku2 = #{sku2}, sku3 = #{sku3}, sku_barcode = #{skuBarcode}, retail_price = #{retailPrice}, deal_price = #{dealPrice}, counts = #{counts} WHERE id = #{id}
